```{r}
set.seed(20)
irisCluster=kmeans(iris[,3:4],3,nstart=20)
irisCluster
```

```{r}
irisCluster$cluster=as.factor(irisCluster$cluster)
ggplot(iris,aes(Petal.Length,Petal.Width,color=irisCluster$cluster))+geom_point()
```
